statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -1 \\ 2 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -4 \\ 1 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -8 \\ 2 \\ 6 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 16 \\ 38 \\ -13 \\ -25 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 3 \\ 0 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -1 \\ 2 \\ -1 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
